Title: Treachery
Actors: Travis Fimmel, Katheryn Winnick, Clive Standen, Jessalyn Gilsig
Plot: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.
